Title: Chor Bani Thangaat Kare
Writer: Rahul Bhole, Chetan Dhanani, Vinit Kanojia, Mehul Vyas
Actors: Amit Mistry, Bijal Joshi, Prem Gadhavi, Ojas Rawal
Plot: Rajkumar Trivedi , aka robin, is a kleptomaniac who cannot stop stealing , and his only way of recovering is by finding true love.. unfortunately , his love and life are both jeopardised ...
